data.what_is:
Engage with your customers across multiple channels from a single cloud-based marketing platform.

Create a centralised marketing database and gain single-view-of-customer. Easily personalise, segment and target your customers with the right message through the right channel at the right time.
data.product_description: Engage is a sophisticated online marketing platform that's refreshingly simple to use. It cleverly utilises your company's data to create customised digital communications, resulting in more meaningful customer relationships.Ubiquity is NZ's only provider that delivers complete end-to-end marketing automation solutions.Unlike other 'technology-only' vendors, we're the only company that has both a platform and the in-house specialists that know how to use technologies and data to drive superior marketing results.
data.positioning_against_competitor: Product DescriptionEngage is a sophisticated online marketing platform that's refreshingly simple to use. It cleverly utilises your company's data to create customised digital communications, resulting in more meaningful customer relationships.Ubiquity is NZ's only provider that delivers complete end-to-end marketing automation solutions.Unlike other 'technology-only' vendors, we're the only company that has both a platform and the in-house specialists that know how to use technologies and data to drive superior marketing results.Seller DetailsSellerUbiquityYear Founded2000HQ LocationAuckland, New ZealandLinkedIn(r) Pagewww.linkedin.com29 employees on LinkedIn(r)GMOverview Provided by:Guy BibbyCTO Ubiquity & CEO CyberSecure 360

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ubiquity Engage?
is completely customizable, you can change the interface and adapt it to the characteristics of the corporation, it has a module of notifications by email, improve your advertising and marketing

What do you dislike about Ubiquity Engage?
It is very expensive and the return on investment is usually a bit long, for this reason it is considered to acquire the enterprise version but its license expires after 6 months and it is not renewed.

Recommendations to others considering Ubiquity Engage:
use it It is excellent to centralize the information in the cloud and your customers can access it

What problems is Ubiquity Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sales increased by 15% during the time the software was in production
